message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique and valuable item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $250. This is a great deal, considering its worth to me is no less than $150. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $250 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $180. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I understand that $180 is a bit higher than your budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $220. This is still a great deal, considering its worth to me is no less than $150. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $220 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $200 for the product. Can you consider that price?

Hi Bob, I understand that $200 is still a bit of a stretch for you, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $210. This is as low as I can go, considering its worth to me is no less than $150. What do you think?
I appreciate your flexibility, but $210 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $190 for the product. Can you consider that price?
